observationText: The Nf1+/R681X mouse model harbors a patient-derived Nf1 gene mutation (c.2041C>T;p.R681X) and was generated by crossing Nf1+/R681X mice with wild-type C57BL/6J mice to produce heterozygous Nf1+/R681X and wild-type littermates.
Homozygous deletion of the Nf1 gene is embryonically lethal in the Nf1+/R681X model, similar to human NF1 patients, so only the heterozygous condition was modeled.
The Nf1Arg681* allele transcripts undergo nonsense-mediated decay, indicating this is a true null allele.
